text: The Apple Vision Pro is an mixed-reality headset developed by Apple. It runs VisionOS. It was announced on June 5, 2023. It was released on February 2, 2024 in United States only. == Availability == Apple Vision Pro was released for the first time in United States only, later, they were available in other countries like United Kingdom, China, Japan, United Arab Emirates, South Korea, Germany, France, Singapore, Canada, Taiwan and Hong Kong. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Apple products released in 2020s Category:Apple hardware
title: Apple Vision Pro
